Class TableView

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, DataObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, TableObserver, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class TableView
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
implements TableObserver

TableView displays an HDF dataset as a two-dimensional table.

Version:
1.3.0 1/28/2002
Author:
Peter X. Cao
See Also:
Serialized Form
